text:
Poor attachment results in the following: 
/lozenge6 It causes pain and/or damage to the nipples, leading to sore nipples.
/lozenge6 Th  e breast does not get completely emptied of milk, resulting in breast 
engorgement.
/lozenge6 Th  e milk supply becomes poor, so that the baby is not satisfi ed and is irritable aft er 
feeding.
/lozenge6 Th  e baby does not put on enough weight. 
/circle6 If the baby is having the following problems, take him/her immediately to the MO at the
